ygData.subject: Greetings all
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello All, I am Froogal, a Dwarven Paladin, doing the work of Brell where I may. After playing another character on another server, I decided I liked Froogal
ygData.messageBody:
Hello All,
I am Froogal, a Dwarven Paladin, doing the work of Brell where I may. After
playing another character on another server, I decided I liked Froogal and
Bristlebane better than my other Character and Server. I do try to RP a bit,
but lacking in imagination and practice; my RP skills are weak. I am willing
to group with just about anyone, provided they are friendly and willing to
help others when they can. If you see Froogal, be sure and say hello and
offer him some good deals. He is always in search of a bargain.
Froogal,
10th level Paladin,
Freeport
